title: Markov Q. Aurelius
subtitle: Philosopher for the 21st Century
alt: Hosted on Heroku: Markov Aurelius, the Philosopher King
description: Uses Marcus Aurelius's "Meditations" and a Markov Chain to generate philosophical quotes that are both displayed on a website and posted to Twitter once every morning.
techStack: Ruby & Sinatra; Twitter & marky_markov Ruby gems; deployed to Heroku; daily post through a Rake task via Heroku Scheduler

title: Mars Attracts!
subtitle: Book a Flight to Mars! (Not Really)
description: A speculative fiction flight reservation app set in the near future, facilitating relocation to a newly colonized Mars. Built over 2+ weeks as part of a team of 3.
techStack: Angular.js frontend, Ruby on Rails backend; ForecastIO & MAAS Mars Weather APIs; Foundation & Simple_Form Ruby gems; Haml & Sass templating; PostgreSQL database; deployed to Heroku

title: Textspiration
subtitle: Inspiration to your Pocket
description: A service to send daily inspirational messages to subscribers. Built for a weekend hackathon as part of a team of 3.
techStack: Ruby on Rails; Twilio Ruby gem; PostgreSQL database; deployed to Heroku
